welcome_message_body: Welcome to Jutiapa, Guatemala! This charming city is known for its beautiful landscapes, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Jutiapa has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Pollo Campero Metro Plaza
restaurants.description: Pollo Campero Metro Plaza is a fried chicken joint located in Jutiapa.
restaurants.address: Km 116 CA1 Oriente (Centro Comercial Metro Plaza), Jutiapa
